WRITING.TITLE: When challenging Oryx this week, do not kill the thralls after staggering him....
WRITING.TEXT: ....at least if you have a hunter in your team. I did the challenge yesterday with a LFG group and one of the guys told us to let the thralls come to us in the middle (between the sisters pillars) after we we staggered Oryx to tether them. This gave us a lot of Orbs during the fight to build supers back up and I found it a cool technique, plus I have not read that on here. Here is how you do it: After killing all Ogres and Knights, everybody gathers in the middle with the relic runner to stagger Oryx. After staggering him focus on the taken captains and acolytes. Then let the thralls come to the aura and have one hunter tether them. Enjoy your Orbs! Edit: Added some stuff
If you have a good enough group sure, but it might help someone.
I guess so
Yep;) thanks for the run
Oh yes, my bad, you are right
Thanksgiving Mike Tolbert
7:18 RG/ LG/ RT Stay safe!

WRITING.TITLE: Give me the ability to watch my friends camera when I #180;m dead!
WRITING.TEXT: Title

Many people are saying that death shouldn #180;t be rewarded, I agree with that. When I made this post I was doing challenge and ended up being dead in the boss area. My teammates got pushed back and unable to revive me for about 3 minutes. I never thought about this as being an advantage....I manly thought about this because I was bored.

WRITING.TITLE: Noob Question
WRITING.TEXT: Guys, I see all the posts about min/max....what does min/max actually mean?
Thanx Guys!
From my understanding you get PxC, HE's at lvl 30 not sure about HE DT tho!
I completely agree with you sir. P2 ftw tho ;)

I don't get the downvote. I would have loved if somebody told me to leave those long distance drivers out of my bag for the start. Try to learn the techniques with slower discs. Drivers are way to forgiving to learn a proper throw. So do yourself a favor, I know it's hard, but leave those drivers out of your bag for at least the first month. Just my 2 ct

WRITING.TITLE: [Complaint] Beeing Team Instict sucks in Raids
WRITING.TEXT: So, I love the Raid update but, oh my god, do I hate the reward system (regarding the balls) at the end of the Raids. I #180;m Team Instinct and we have just done a 20 man Raid where I was the only Instinct player. The result was that I ended up with 6 Balls in total. The other Teams however got 9-12 balls. This sucks big time. With the catch rate being 2% or 23% at maximum, I get an additional penalty just for choosing the wrong team over a year ago. Rant over. Sorry guys love the game, just sad that I did not get an Articuno :( I #180;m happy for all of you that managed to get one tho!
Actually thats not far from where I live. I might come over for a day.....do you happen do have disc golf courses close by, do you know that?
I fought 8, beat all of them, catched none :(
